title: Gatekeeper Vi
body:
http://img2.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_1172.jpg
:: **Gatekeeper Galio**

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CLxxBu7Cvgc/Vgsw1GXsAuI/AAAAAAAAyJo/AXgFwl3p268/s640/eon.jpg
:: Demon **Vi**

___
 Maybe it's a Creator Viktor / BattleCast thing.
Maybe it should be renamed?

Just sayin' ...

http://imgur.com/1WKVQpM

replies.body: Well the Vi is called Demon Vi for starters and it's a 1350 skin, not a 1800 skin like Galio.
Skin tier doesn't generally affect naming. :] For example, we have a Legendary Eternum skin (Nocturne), and a 1350 RP Eternum skin (Rek'Sai).

hey katey 
just a question but would you guys ever consider giving valkeryie diana her headpiece back i really did like it a lot and a lot of people back then only said they didnt want it cause they thought its too similar to diana are the same people (and more!) now saying they miss it
Similar to Syndra*, and yeah I want the headpiece back too :).
I know, I have them both ^^ It seemed they were trying to compare the two skins' quality/animations, etc. and my point was they are two different skin tiers, so no need to "compare them".

> [{quoted}](name=Bixits,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hdwE0cUI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-30T16:46:52.392+0000)
>
> Vi is called Demon Vi

I know.

RIOT, Johnny Gat (Saints Row) Jayce WHEN!?
http://core0.staticworld.net/images/article/2014/08/saints-row-gat-goes-to-hell-100411283-orig.png

Don't question the reasons for skins, Riot doesn't really care if you don't like the purpose of the skin.
They made it to make it, you buy it or not.
What else can we do?

Gate-Smasher Vi is better.
Or a Rockem Sockem Robot kinda thing.
Unless Vi is guarding an actual gate like Galio is doing in his splash art, I see no reason as to why it should be renamed Gatekeeper.
That would be her police skin. lol
Maybe Gatesmasher or Gatebreaker Vi would fit a bit better. This skin could be renamed quite easily if Riot wanted to as it's still on the PBE and doesn't even have a splash art.
